name: PnPPowerShell
description: Can use PowerShell cmdlets inline or with a referenced script.
author: Sebastian Sch√ºtze

inputs.name: SharePointVersion
inputs.label: SharePoint Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: SharePoint version to witch the PnP xml should be deployed to.

inputs.name: FileOrInline
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of the script: File Path or Inline Xml.

inputs.name: PnPPowerShellInline
inputs.label: Inline PnP PowerShell
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Allows you to specify PowerShell containing PnP PowerShell cmdlets.

Check the [official documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/sharepoint/sharepoint-pnp/sharepoint-pnp-cmdlets?view=sharepoint-ps) for command that can be used.

inputs.name: PnPPowerShellFilePath
inputs.label: PnP Xml Path
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Path to the PowerShell file containing the PnP.

Check the [existing schema](https://github.com/SharePoint/PnP-Provisioning-Schema) for a well formatted PnP xml file.
